description: Glenn is a self-employed Filipino front-end web developer from Vienna, Austria and builds websites and web applications for companies across the globe.
i-am: I'm Glenn, a web developer from Vienna, Austria.
i-do: I build awesome websites and web applications for you.
about-tldr: I'm Glenn, a self-employed Filipino front-end web developer from Vienna, Austria. I build websites and web applications for companies across the globe. I love working on great web designs and modern front-end web technologies focusing on performance and user experience.
about-resume: I'm an alumnus of the University of Applied Science Technikum Wien, graduating with a Bachelor of Science in Engineering with a major in Information and Communication Systems and Services. I work on the Styria Digital Lab team focusing on generating ideas and creating innovative websites and applications. I'm part-time self-employed and I learn a lot from the open source community. In the past, I've built websites for clients such as ProSiebenSat.1, METRO GROUP, Volkswagen, 3i Group and more, at nexxar. I'm passionate about producing amazing websites and great applications, contributing on incredible open source technologies.
about-private: When I'm not coding or designing, I love to spend my time with my lovely wife Charmaine, my family and friends. I enjoy travelling around the world and discover cities and cultures. I'm an Apple and Nike enthusiast who loves to play the guitar and listen to JM Music.
about-questions: If you have any questions or if you're interested on working together, feel free to
about-connect: For more about me, you can also find me on
design-description: I produce modern web and UI design with simplicity and perfection, pixel for pixel. I provide consultancy on design concepts, to get the best out of your Corporate Identity and to distinguish your project from the competition.
dev-description: I develop interactive websites and applications progressively to provide great usability and user experience. I build valuable products, focusing on performance, scalability and maintainability.
rwd-description: I create responsive websites in a mobile first approach to deliver an optimized layout and the best experience on any device.
work-by-nexxar: Created in an employment relationship with nexxar
contact-projects: I'm currently accepting projects from agencies and companies around the globe. If you are interested on working together,
contact-help: If you need help on building your website or application, just pop me an email at
policy-main: If the opportunity for the input of personal or business data (email addresses, name, addresses) is given, the input of these data takes place voluntarily. The use and payment of all offered services are permitted - if and so far technically possible and reasonable - without specification of any personal data or under specification of anonymized data or an alias. The use of published postal addresses, telephone or fax numbers and email addresses for marketing purposes is prohibited, offenders sending unwanted spam messages will be punished.
policy-ga:
This website uses Google Analytics, a web analytics service provided by Google, Inc. (“Google”). Google Analytics uses “cookies”, which are text files placed on your computer, to help the website analyze how users use the site. The information generated by the cookie about your use of the website (including your IP address) will be transmitted to and stored by Google on servers in the United States.

In case of activation of the IP anonymization, Google will truncate/anonymize the last octet of the IP address for Member States of the European Union as well as for other parties to the Agreement on the European Economic Area. Only in exceptional cases, the full IP address is sent to and shortened by Google servers in the USA. On behalf of the website provider Google will use this information for the purpose of evaluating your use of the website, compiling reports on website activity for website operators and providing other services relating to website activity and internet usage to the website provider. Google will not associate your IP address with any other data held by Google. You may refuse the use of cookies by selecting the appropriate settings on your browser. However, please note that if you do this, you may not be able to use the full functionality of this website. Furthermore you can prevent Google’s collection and use of data (cookies and IP address) by downloading and installing the browser plug-in available under https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout?hl=en-GB.
disclaimer-1-text: The author reserves the right not to be responsible for the topicality, correctness, completeness or quality of the information provided. Liability claims regarding damage caused by the use of any information provided, including any kind of information which is incomplete or incorrect,will therefore be rejected. All offers are not-binding and without obligation. Parts of the pages or the complete publication including all offers and information might be extended, changed or partly or completely deleted by the author without separate announcement.
disclaimer-2-text: The author is not responsible for any contents linked or referred to from his pages - unless he has full knowledge of illegal contents and would be able to prevent the visitors of his site fromviewing those pages. If any damage occurs by the use of information presented there, only the author of the respective pages might be liable, not the one who has linked to these pages. Furthermore the author is not liable for any postings or messages published by users of discussion boards, guestbooks or mailinglists provided on his page.
disclaimer-3-text: The author intended not to use any copyrighted material for the publication or, if not possible, to indicate the copyright of the respective object. The copyright for any material created by the author is reserved. Any duplication or use of objects such as images, diagrams, sounds or texts in other electronic or printed publications is not permitted without the author's agreement.
disclaimer-4-text: This disclaimer is to be regarded as part of the internet publication which you were referred from. If sections or individual terms of this statement are not legal or correct, the content or validity of the other parts remain uninfluenced by this fact.
